name: IBM Lotus Organizer 97 GS Database
summary: An OR4 file is a database created by IBM Lotus Organizer 97 GS or 4.1, a personal information manager (PIM). It contains a user's contact list, calendar, to-do list, call record, and other information.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: IBM Lotus Organizer 97 GS or later
